Package org.mozilla.jrex.event.window

Interface Summary
WindowEventConstants A interface containing the constants related to window events.
WindowListener The JRex WindowListener interface, This listener can be added to listen to any window creation and disposing action taken by JRex window manager.
 

Class Summary
CreateEventParam The class wrapping the create window event parameters.
WindowEvent A class representing JRex Window Event.
WindowEventHandler The JRex Event handler for window events.
